ActCanada Transportation Act
SubjectOrder Rescinding Canadian Transportation Agency Decision Nº 392-R-2008 and directing that the CTA reconsider Peace River Coal Inc.'s application of April 22, 2008.
PrecisOrder Rescinding CANADIAN TRANSPORTATION AGENCY DECISION Nº 392-R-2008 of July 31, 2008, therefore returning Peace River Coal Incorporated's application dated April 22, 2008 to the Agency for determination.
